name: Survival Lance
description:
This prototype was made by the students of the 3rd cycle (2021 -1) of "Design and development of video games and digital entertainment" at the Toulouse Lautrec Institute - Lima - Peru.

Made as final work of the cycle, it is now published for the satisfaction of the users.

DEVELOPERS:

- Lead designer: 

Andres Ruiz.

- Lead programmer:

 Francis Perez.

- Lead Artist: 

Jorge Sakino.
